p: Ethyl 1-((1H-1,2,4-triazol-1-yl)methyl)-2-phenylcyclopropane-1-carboxylate (46). Purification using a gradient of ethyl acetate in petroleum ether afforded the product as a yellow oil in 38% yield. 1H NMR (300 MHz, CDCl 3) δ 8.09 (d, J = 13.9 Hz, 1H), 7.86 (s, 1H), 7.42 − 7.25 (m, 5H), 4.71 (d, J = 14.7 Hz, 1H), 4.29 − 4.14 (m, 2H), 3.46 (dd, J = 14.4, 2.1 Hz, 1H), 3.17 − 3.01 (m, 1H), 1.86 (ddt, J = 9.2, 5.4, 3.3 Hz, 2H), 1.28 (t, J = 7.1 Hz, 3H).
